scenario_text.value: *huff* *huff*... We did it!

Come on, don’t get soft on me over something
so trivial.

This won’t be the last time I steamroll your
enemies like this!

Now you’ve got the power you asked for⁠—the
power to protect!
Dracumon...
My name’s Beelzebumon.
It was your tenacity that gave me this form.
My grit, huh? Haha, not bad.

Don’t worry, I’ll make sure you won’t regret
believing in me.
Um, excuse me...
Yeah?
Yeeep!

Heyyy, Kaito, Beelzebumon! Don’t go glaring at
him, you’re scaring him to death!
Oh, uh, I didn’t mean to...

It’s all right, my queen! They may look
scary, but I know they’re kind, gentle souls!
G-gentle souls...?

You fought so bravely, against enemies that
would make anyone shiver in fear!

For protecting me like that...I thank you
from the bottom of my heart!
Whaddaya say to that, Kaito?

It’s not like I fought to protect you. If
anyone wanted you safe, it was Miu.

Still, Kaito, Palmon’s happy that you saved
him.

...’Zat right? Well, if you insist on
thanking me, I won’t stop you.
Kaito...

Well, all the kids from the amusement park
are super weak, as I’m sure you know.

And maybe they’re not the brightest, either,
but they’re not bad.

I’m just happy they’re safe. Guess I can
count on you from time to time. So, um...
Thank you...for saving them, Kaito.
...Miu!

You’re happy I protected you... That you
could count on me...!
All right!!!

Oh, cut it out, would you?! You’re
embarrassing me...

You know I’d do anything for ya! Don’t ya,
Miu?!

And that’s not all! I’m going to look out for
anyone you care for too!

Oh, okay, just calm down! I still don’t like
you getting all up in my business!

If it’ll protect you, I’ll totally get up in
your business! Including your dental care!

Are you serious?! Uuugh, you’re SO annoying,
Kaito!
Miuuu-huu-huu!

Just look at those brownie points, vanishing
into the ether...

Ah well, just means we’ll have to keep
building them up as we go, right?
Beelzebumon...

I’ll follow your heart, Kaito. Use me as you
see fit.

I’ll be your power, if you so desire. Power
to protect what’s important to you, yeah?
Exactly! I’m counting on you, Beelzebumon!
